modName: Eye fix for Ghostwalk from Apocalypse MOD
summary: Eyefix v2.0 for Apocalypse v8.03, need skse
descriptionHtml:
Just grabbed [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23916]Invisibility Glitch - Eyes Fix by [b]KingsGambit[/b][/url] v2.0 and followed the author's note, inject the fix into [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225]Apocalypse - Magic of Skyrim by [b]Enai Siaion[/b][/url] v8.03.

Since I found no fix on nexus, so I made this for convenience.

[b][color=#980000]SKSE IS required[/color][/b]

[b]Installation[/b]

You might want to backup your [Apocalypse - The Spell Package.esp] file.
Works only for v8.03 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16225]Apocalypse - Magic of Skyrim by [b]Enai Siaion[/b][/url].

Extract all files into Skyrim Installation folder, override your [Apocalypse - The Spell Package.esp] file.
author: No one
